decks.notes: This deck focuses on assembling a diverse group of creatures with various abilities to create a powerful toolbox of options. By utilizing combo elements and flexible removal spells, the deck aims to control the board while setting up game-winning combinations with key cards such as Grist, the Hunger Tide and The One Ring. Additionally, the inclusion of powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Overlord of the Balemurk provides additional win conditions. The deck's structure allows for adaptability and resilience in a variety of matchups, making it a versatile and potent choice for competitive play.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with the UrzaTron lands and using powerful Eldrazi creatures to control the board and win the game. The key idea is to disrupt your opponent's strategy with cards like Chalice of the Void and All Is Dust, while also generating card advantage and threats with Karn, the Great Creator and Thought-Knot Seer. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with big creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and World Breaker, while also having access to powerful spells and artifacts to further control the game.

This Ruby Storm deck focuses on generating mana quickly through spell and creature interactions to cast powerful spells and combo off before the opponent can respond. The deck includes cards like Ral, Monsoon Mage, Ruby Medallion, and rituals to accelerate mana production, while also utilizing Past in Flames and Wish to recur spells from the graveyard. By chaining together spells and generating a large amount of mana, the deck seeks to win the game in a single explosive turn through cards like Flame of Anor and Glimpse the Impossible.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful removal spells, counterspells, and disruptive creatures. By disrupting your opponent's plans and maintaining a board advantage, you can slowly grind out a victory by controlling the pace of the game. The deck relies on a mix of card advantage, graveyard recursion, and efficient removal to outvalue and outmaneuver your opponent. With a mix of early game disruption and late game threats, this deck aims to outlast and outsmart your opponents in a slow, methodical battle of attrition.
